thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: GLENDA
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by GLENDA

author: GLENDA
title: GLENDA
text:
Bit disappointed that I booked online with Airport rentals and didn't go direct to Redspot would make sure I did this next time. Never book on the internet with Airport Rentals, as you pay the insurance to have the excess removed, then you need to pay again with Redspot on collection of the car.
As the lovely girl at Redspot informed me I had paid to have the excess reimbursed at the underwriters discretion, I would still have to pay the $4,000 excess if I had an accident to Redspot, then try and claim it back from Airport rentals (best of luck if you can get it!).
